text: innum avarkal; "nankal um'mutan cerntu inner valiyai (kur'anai) pinparruvomanal enkal nattaivittu vankal tukki eriyappatuvom" enru kurukirarkal; nam avarkalaic cankaiyana itattil patukappaka vacikkumpati vaikkavillaiya? Avvitattil ovvoru vakaik kanivarkkamum nam'mitamiruntulla unavakak kontuvarappatukiratu eninum avarkalil perumpalor itai ariya mattarkal
